summary: The diff does not provide evidence that new Listing creation paths in `backend/main.mo` now explicitly set `propertyStatus = #available`. Additionally, `project_state.json` was modified, which violates the constraint to only change Listing creation-time defaulting in `backend/main.mo`.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the backend listing creation logic in `backend/main.mo` so that whenever a new `Listing` record is created, it explicitly sets `propertyStatus = #available` across every code path that constructs/stores a new `Listing`.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided truncated `backend/main.mo` excerpt only shows type/record definitions (including `PropertyStatus` and `Listing.propertyStatus`) and does not show any listing-construction code paths being updated to explicitly assign `propertyStatus = #available` at creation time. With the diff truncated, there is insufficient evidence that the creation logic was updated as required.
evidence: backend/main.mo (truncated; shows type definitions but no listing creation logic)

hallucinated_features.description: Modified `project_state.json` content unrelated to setting `propertyStatus = #available` at Listing creation time in `backend/main.mo`.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraint explicitly says: "Do not modify anything other than setting `propertyStatus = #available` at new `Listing` creation time in `backend/main.mo`." Any change to `project_state.json` is out of scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Potential broader backend model/type changes shown in `backend/main.mo` (e.g., presence of `PropertyStatus` type and `Listing.propertyStatus` field) beyond the narrowly-scoped creation-time defaulting change.
hallucinated_features.reason: The request scope is limited to setting `propertyStatus = #available` at creation time and forbids other modifications. The truncated diff excerpt for `backend/main.mo` prominently includes `PropertyStatus` and `propertyStatus` in the `Listing` record, which may indicate additional changes beyond creation-time assignment; however, due to truncation, it cannot be confirmed what exactly changed.
